t: Psalm 118
Praise to God for His Everlasting Mercy
Oh,*pn give thanks to the Lord,*s for He*i is*i good! For*ld His mercy endures*i forever.
Let*ln Israel now say, “His*ld mercy endures*i forever.”
Let*ld the house of Aaron now say, “His*ld mercy endures*i forever.”
Let*ld those who fear the Lord*s now say, “His*ld mercy endures*i forever.”

It*ild is*i better to trust in the Lord*s Than*ld to put confidence in princes.
